alert.note: Alert for Andrews; Ector; Loving; Winkler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 11:32PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lea, northwestern Ector, Andrews, central Winkler and eastern Loving Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT/1100 PM MDT/... At 1132 PM CDT/1032 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles northwest of Andrews to 18 miles north of Mentone. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Andrews, Kermit, Eunice, Jal, Jal Airport, Florey, Bennett, Frankel City, Slash Ranch, Winkler County Airport and Andrews County Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
